entry.title: First Log - Lots of changes
entry.content: This log entry marks the commencement of the Geometor.model project. After extensive changes in recent months, the project’s concepts, though not new, are entering a phase of significant development. The primary focus has been on refining the Geometor code, transitioning from the original Geometor Explorer, which encompassed a broad range of functions, to a more segmented approach. This segmentation allows for a clearer division of the project’s key components: modeling, rendering, and analyzing complex geometric constructions.
entry.summary: This log entry marks the commencement of the Geometor.model project. After extensive changes in recent months, the project’s concepts, though not new, are entering a phase of significant development. The primary focus has been on refining the Geometor code, transitioning from the original Geometor Explorer, which encompassed a broad range of functions, to a more segmented approach. This segmentation allows for a clearer division of the project’s key components: modeling, rendering, and analyzing complex geometric constructions.
